landing.subtitle: Knowle connects you with people to exchange skills and knowledge. Teach a skill, learn a new one. It's that simple.

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.visibilitySubtitle: Control what other users see on your public profile.
editProfile.languagesSpokenPlaceholder: Type a language and press Enter

findMatches.title: Find a Match
findMatches.subtitle: Powered by AI to find your perfect learning partner ✨
findMatches.updateProfilePrompt: Please add skills you can teach and want to learn to your profile to find matches.
findMatches.noMatchesBody: We couldn't find anyone that matches your skills right now. Try adding more skills you know and want to learn to get better matches!

teacherDashboard.title: Teacher Analytics
teacherDashboard.subtitle: Insights into your teaching performance and community impact.
teacherDashboard.noDataBody: Complete a few exchanges as a teacher to see your analytics here!

assessment.title: Skill Assessment
assessment.generating_subtitle: The AI is preparing questions to test your knowledge.
assessment.complete_subtitle: Based on your answers, the AI has assessed your proficiency in {{topic}} as:

events.title: Events & Workshops
events.subtitle: Join live group sessions hosted by expert community members.
events.noEventsSubtitle: Check back later or be the first to host one!

notifications.skillVerifiedBody: Congratulations! Your expertise in {{topicName}} is now recognized.

roadmap.title: Community Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Suggest and vote on the next features for Knowle!
roadmap.noRequestsBody: Be the first to suggest a new feature for the platform!

modal.title: Suggest a New Feature
modal.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Dark mode for the interface
modal.descriptionPlaceholder: Explain how this feature would work and why it would be useful for the community.
